game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: In this quest, you must search for the lost artifact hidden deep within the ancient ruins of a forgotten civilization. The artifact is said to possess immense power and whoever finds it will be bestowed with great wisdom and riches.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a rare magical item

task.objective: Find the entrance to the ruins
task.description: Your first task is to locate the hidden entrance that leads to the ancient ruins. The entrance is rumored to be concealed behind a waterfall.
